str2: When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A thousand. Plural of uncertain affinity; a thousand.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I end, finish, (b) I fulfill, accomplish, (c) I pay. From telos; to end, i.e. Complete, execute, conclude, discharge.
An adversary, Satan. Of Chaldee origin corresponding to ma'bad; the accuser, i.e. The devil.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular

str2: From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From phulasso; a guarding or, the act, the person; figuratively, the place, the condition, or, the time, literally or figuratively.
